name: Haram
description:
A short narrative walking simulator inspired by the photography of Andres Serrano.

Content Warnings: Mild depictions of guts/gore, insects, animal cruelty, fecal matter, vomit and possibly other corporeal fluids. May also feature content some consider blasphemous.

Developed by Stef Pinto 

In collaboration with Penquin Games

With music by Johar Ibrahim
